channel.title: Players don't loose items on death? DeltaClean. $
channel.description: Hi, I am using deltacleaned and no items get dropped when a player is killed, everything is inplace it seems, the youdied() the keepitems all that. I am doing something wrong... If anyone can give this problem pm me we can talk on gchat or live messenger. I'll provide compensation for your time!

item.title: Players don't loose items on death? DeltaClean. $
item.dc:creator: @Jakes10 Jakes10
item.description:
@Jakes10 wrote:

Hi, I am using deltacleaned and no items get dropped when a player is killed, everything is inplace it seems, the youdied() the keepitems all that. I am doing something wrong…
If anyone can give this problem pm me we can talk on gchat or live messenger. I’ll provide compensation for your time!
